# [Interview #462: TGS Signing Report - Old (Peter) Salt, Entry #6](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=462#6)

#### Old (Peter) Salt

It was mentioned that a fight between Egwene and Cadsuane would be totally awesome. I concur.
